_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Corrupt wishes [an10.23:8.21]: Faithless person wishing to be known as faithful
Unethical person wishing to be known as ethical
Uneducated person wishing to be known as learned
Lover of company wishing to be known as secluded
Lazy person wishing to be known as energetic
Unmindful person wishing to be known as mindful
Person without immersion wishing to be known as having immersion
Witless person wishing to be known as wise
Person who has not ended the defilements wishing to be known as having ended the defilements
